mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (room_id, item_id, created_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{itemId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT seller_id FROM item WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO chat_room_user (room_id, user_id, user_type) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{userId}, #{userType})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT cr.*, i.item_id, i.price, i.description FROM chat_room cr JOIN chat_room_user cru ON cr.room_id = cru.room_id JOIN item i ON cr.item_id = i.item_id WHERE cru.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC
SELECT DISTINCT cm.* FROM chat_message cm JOIN chat_room_user cru ON cm.message_id = cru.message_id WHERE cru.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY cm.sent_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (content, sent_time, is_read) VALUES ( #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sentTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, false )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_room_user WHERE message_id = #{messageId}
